title: Trump's plans to vet visa applicants using social media are flawed, a watchdog says
text: The nations singled out for restrictions have unreliable police forces or lack identity systems to help confirm travelers are who they say they are, he said. The ban on entry applies to citizens and nationals from Iran, Libya, Somalia, Sudan, Syria and Yemen. Trump's original executive order, issued in January, prevented immigrants from these countries, as well as Iraq, from entering the United States.
summary:
The nations singled out for restrictions have unreliable police forces or lack identity systems to help confirm travelers are who they say they are, he said.
The ban on entry applies to citizens and nationals from Iran, Libya, Somalia, Sudan, Syria and Yemen.
Trump's original executive order, issued in January, prevented immigrants from these countries, as well as Iraq, from entering the United States.
